comment: Part 1 of the Riesz representation theorem for bounded linear functionals. A linear functional is bounded iff its value can be expressed as an inner product. Part of Theorem 17.3 of [Halmos] p. 31. For part 2, see ~ riesz2 . For the continuous linear functional version, see ~ riesz3i and ~ riesz4 . (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
